quantityRules.description: Bearded dragons are solitary and territorial. House individually only - minimum 75 gallons (48Ã—24Ã—24 inches).

setupTips: Provide basking platform under heat lamp for thermoregulation
Use tile or non-particle substrate to prevent impaction
Include branches and rocks for climbing enrichment
notes: Diurnal and highly active during the day
Omnivorous - requires both insects and vegetables
Social and can be handleable with proper taming

warnings.message: UVB lighting is essential - use tube-style UVB 10.0 bulbs, not compact coils
Avoid loose substrates (sand, walnut shells) which can cause impaction if ingested

feedingRequirements: Dust insects with calcium and D3 supplement
feedingSchedule: Juveniles (0-6 months): Daily insects, daily greens
Sub-adults (7-12 months): Daily insects, daily greens
Adults (1 year+): Insects 3-4x weekly, daily greens
waterNotes: Provide shallow water dish for drinking and soaking
Some beardies prefer to drink from droplets - mist occasionally
mistingNotes: Ensure proper ventilation to prevent humidity buildup
